question: What do waves deposit to form sandbars and barrier islands?

nodes.text: Magma deposits waves to form sandbars and barrier islands.
Organisms deposit waves to form sandbars and barrier islands.
Glaciers deposit waves to form sandbars and barrier islands.
Sediments are deposited by waves to form sandbars and barrier islands.
